overview: Ms. Deniz will marry Nurperi with her father's compulsion. For Otilia concert, Deniz went to Burgazada a week before Nurperi's bed and encountered the sun while diving here. The sea thinks that the sun is hearing impaired and decides to learn sign language to communicate with it. As the young man begins to communicate with the sign language, the Sun begins to think that he is hearing impaired.
title: Sea and Sun
